description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work includes curating courses like "Align The Misaligned," which explores self-discovery and strategic planning for entrepreneurs, helping them align personal attributes with business goals.
blurb: The journey to "Align The Misaligned" involves self-discovery and strategic planning. By identifying personal strengths, acknowledging weaknesses, analyzing your startup's position, and formulating a critical ask, you gain a comprehensive understanding of yourself and your business.
